content.description: This problem deals with functions defined by f(x) = x + b sin x , where b is a positive constant and −2π ≤ x ≤ 2π .
content.question: Sketch the graphs of two of these functions, y = x + sin x and y = x + 3 sin x .

frqParts.text: Sketch the graphs of two of these functions, y = x + sin x and y = x + 3 sin x .

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
